prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift on 10 July 1967.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains letters from James Fenimore Cooper to Francis Moore and Mr. Wadell.
Cooper to Francis Moore regarding corrections for unidentified book. This item is found in James Franklin Beard's Letters and Journals of James Fenimore Cooper, Volume VI, 293.

did.unittitle: James Fenimore Cooper to Mr. Wadell n.d.

scopecontent.p: Cooper to Mr. Wadell, thanks and asks him about sending some books.
